parametrized_description: Determine the number of motion activated machines and manual machines to minimize the total number of machines, ensuring that the number of manual machines does not exceed MaxManualPercentage of the total machines, at least MinMotionActivatedMachines are motion activated, the combined drop rate is at least MinTotalDrops, and the total energy consumption does not exceed MaxTotalEnergy.

MotionActivatedDropRate.description: Drop rate (drops per minute) of motion activated machine

MotionActivatedEnergyConsumption.description: Energy consumption (kWh) of motion activated machine

ManualDropRate.description: Drop rate (drops per minute) of manual machine

MaxManualPercentage.description: Maximum percentage of machines that can be manual

MinMotionActivatedMachines.description: Minimum number of motion activated machines

MinTotalDrops.description: Minimum total drop delivery (drops per minute)

MaxTotalEnergy.description: Maximum total energy consumption (kWh per minute)

MotionActivatedMachines.description: The number of motion activated machines

constraints.description: The number of manual machines does not exceed MaxManualPercentage of the total machines.
At least MinMotionActivatedMachines are motion activated.
The combined drop rate is at least MinTotalDrops.
The total energy consumption does not exceed MaxTotalEnergy.
The total number of machines is equal to the sum of manual and motion-activated machines.

objective.description: Minimize the total number of machines.
